name: Eggmaggedon
description:
Finished the game? Or just wanna have fun? Use the settings to adjust the population density and pure destruction! 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

MOUSE- Look

SPACE - Jump

LEFT SHIFT - Dash

ESCAPE - Pause

V - Fly to Heaven

Created for Mini Jam 119 over 3 days. 

Pre-made assets:

  • Synty POLYGON City pack
  • Realistic Starter VFX Pack Vol 2 (for heaven clouds)
  • Niagara Mega VFX Pack vol. 1 (for meteor)
  • Chameleon (Postprocess)

Credits:

- Herr Edgy

- Lazanja
